about.title: About Our Craftsmanship
about.subtitle: Excellence in Aluminum Fabrication
about.description: With over 15 years of experience in aluminum fabrication and installation, we have built a reputation for quality, reliability, and professional service across Cyprus. Our skilled craftsmen combine traditional techniques with modern technology to deliver exceptional results.

quality.description: Every project meets the highest standards of craftsmanship and durability.

precision.title: Precision Work
precision.description: Accurate measurements and expert installation ensure perfect results.

trust.title: Trusted Service
trust.description: Family-owned business built on integrity and customer satisfaction.

windows.title: Windows & Doors
windows.description: Custom aluminum windows and doors designed for energy efficiency and security.

railings.title: Railings & Balconies
railings.description: Modern and traditional railing designs for balconies, stairs, and terraces.

shutters.title: Rolling Shutters
shutters.description: Automated and manual rolling shutters for security and weather protection.
